src_text: Khabinethe yo dzhiela nṱha mvelaphanḓa yo swikelwaho kha zwa thoma shumiswa ha Pulane ya Mashumele ya zwa Fulufulu, ngeno nga thungo tshi khou dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza vhuleme vhuhulwane vhukuma vhune ha kha ḓi vha hone kha sisṱeme ya lushaka ya nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iwuncomile umsebenzi osele wenziwe malunga nokuqaliswa ukusetyenziswa kwesiCwangciso sokuSebenza soMbane, nangona ivumile ukuba iziko lombane lesizwe liseneengxakana elijongene nazo.

src_text: Zwenezwi musi shango ḽi tshi khou dzhena kha khalaṅwaha ya Vhuriha, Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa khunyeledzwa ha Khonṱhiraka ya ṋetshedza muḓagasi wa 400 megawatsi (MW) dza ḓadzisa nga kha Mbekanyamushumo ya Ṋetshedzo yo Linganaho (Standard Offer Programme) dzine dza ḓo thoma vha hone kha sisṱeme ya nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi phanḓa ha musi ṅwedzi wa Shundunthule 2023 tshi fhela..
tgt_text: Njengokuba singena kwixesha laseBusika kweli lizwe, iKhabhinethi ikwamkele ukuqukunjelwa kwesiVumelwano sombane ozimegawathi (i-MW) ezingama-400 eziza kongezwa kulo sinawo ovela kwinkqubo ebizwa i-Standard Offer Programme oza kugalelwa kulo wesizwe phambi kokuphela kukaCanzibe wowama-..

src_text: Nga nnḓa ha izwo, Muhasho wa Mutakalo wo ṱalusa zwibadela zwa 213 sa zwone zwine zwa tea sa kwamea nga mafhungo u khaulwa ha muḓagasi nga sielisana, hune zwibadela zwi linganaho 76 kha zwenezwi, zwa vha uri zwo no ḓi thoma sa kwamea nga uhu khaulwa ha muḓagasi nga sielisana ngeno hu na uri mushumo wa engedza zwiṅwe zwibadela zwi linganaho 46 kha mutevhe wa izwo zwine zwa si tee kwamea nga izwo zwa khaulwa ha muḓagasi tsini na khunyeledzwa..
tgt_text: Ukongeza, iSebe lezeMpilo likhethe izibhedlela ezingama-213 ezingazikuchatshazelwa ngucimi-cimi wombane.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ṱanganedza zwa rwelwa ṱari ha Energy One-Stop Shop zwine zwa khou ḓo vha hone hu si kale nga ḽa 31 Shundunthule 2023 nga vha Invest SA itela tshimbidza mafhungo zwa milayo ine ya ḓo thusa khamphani ntswa dza bveledza muḓagasi itela uri na dzone dzi thome shuma nga ṱavhanya..
tgt_text: Kwezi zibhedlela, ezingama-76 sele zixhamla kule nkqubo yokungachatshazelwa ngucimi-cimi wombane, kwaye sele equkunjelwa amalungiselela ezinye ezingama-46 okuzikhusela kule ngxaki kacimi-cimi wombane.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya dzhiela nṱha mvelaphanḓa yo no itwaho fhaḽa kha Tshiṱitshi tsha Muḓagasi tsha Kusile hu tshi itelwa vhuedzedzwa hafhu ha muḓagasi linganaho 3 200 MW, kha yunithi dza 1, 2, 3 na 5, murahu kha sisṱeme ya nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi ya lushaka mafheloni ṅwaha wa..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yawamkela nalo msebenzi uzayo wokusekwa kweZiko lezaMandla elinguNtozonke ngomhla wama-31 kuCanzibe 2023 yi-Invest SA ngeenjongo zokukhawulezisa iinkqubo zokuqulunqa imithetho eza kwenza ukuba kube lula kwiinkampani ezintsha ezivelisa umbane ukuba ziqalise umsebenzi wazo wokuvelisa umbane..

src_text: Khabinethe yo kwamea nga zwiito zwa phaḓaladzwa ha mafhungo ane si vhe ngoho zwine zwa khou bvela phanḓa, hu tshi khou shumiswa nyanḓadzamafhungo dza matshilisano hune khadzo ha khou ambiwa zwauri hu si kale hu khou ḓo vha na wa tshoṱhe ha sisṱeme ya nḓisedzo ya muḓagasi ya lushaka, zwine ha khou pfala uri zwi ḓo fhedza zwo vhanga dzima tshoṱhe ha muḓagasi shango ḽoṱhe.
tgt_text: Ivile nangomsebenzi osele wenziwe kwiZiko loPhehlo-mbane laseKusile sokuba iphinde ivelise umbane ongama-3 200 MW isebenzisa i-unithi 1, 2, 3 no-5 oza kugalelwa kulo wesizwe phambi kokuba lo nyaka wama-2023 uphele.

src_text: Eskom yo fulufhedzisa muvhuso uri hu na pulane dzi re hone kha sisṱeme yavho dza thivhela uri hu si vhe na dzima lwa tshoṱhe ha muḓagasi kha shango ḽoṱhe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ixhalabile zindaba ezibubuvuvu ezisasazwa ngabantu besebenzisa amakhasi onxibelelwano ezityhola ngokuba iziko lombane leli liza kuwa into leyo eza kubangela ukuba isizwe sonke sibe sebumnyameni.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ombedzela khuwelelo kha vhathu vhoṱhe vha fhano Afrika Tshipembe ya uri vha bvele phanḓa na vhulunga muḓagasi.
tgt_text: U-Eskom umxelele urhulumente ukuba unazo izicwangciso zokulalelisela xa kunokwenzeka ukuba umbane ucime pam kwizwelonke.

src_text: Tshipikwa tshihulwane ndi vhulunga muḓagasi linganaho 1 000 MW ḓuvha ḽiṅwe na ḽiṅwe, zwine hezwi zwa lingana na vhulunga luṱa lwoṱhe lwa thoma lwa khaulwa ha muḓagasi nga sielisana ḓuvha ḽiṅwe na ḽiṅwe.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyaqhuba nekhwelo eyayilihlabile lokuba bonke abantu abaseMzantsi Afrika mabonge umbane.

src_text: Minisṱa vha Muḓagasi, Dokotela Vho Kgosientsho Ramokgopa, vha ḓo ḓivhadza shango nga ha thoma shumiswa ha Pulane ya Mashumele ya zwa Fulufulu nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 26 Shundunthule 2023, musi vha tshi khou amba na vhoramafhungo.
tgt_text: Iinjongo zethu kukuba sikwazi ukonga umbane oli-1 000 MW yonke imihla, umyinge lowo ulingana nenqanaba elinye lokucinywa kombane ngosuku ngalinye.

src_text: Mutakalo.
tgt_text: UMphathiswa wezoMbane, uGq Kgosientsho Ramokgopa, uza kunika ingxelo ngeza kutsha nje malunga nokuqaliswa ukusetyenziswa kwesiCwangciso sokuSebenza sezaMandla ngoLwesihlanu, umhla wama-26 kuCanzibe 2023, kwintlanganiso aza kube eyibambe noonondaba.

src_text: Muvhuso wo vhumba komiti ya shuma ya zwa thekiniki, ine ya khou langwa nga Muhasho wa Mutakalo wa Lushaka, nga murahu ha musi ho vha na tshiwo tsha vhulwadze ha Khoḽera ngei Hammanskraal kha Ḓorobo khulwane ya Tshwane, vhune ho no vhulaha vhathu vha swikaho 15 swika zwino, nga ḽa 24 Shundunthule..
tgt_text: Ezempilo.

src_text: Hu na mushumo muhulwane re kati zwazwino wa ita ndingo kha zwiko zwoṱhe zwine zwa nga vha zwi zwone zwo ḓisaho tshikafhadzo iyi, zwi nga vha zwiko zwa maḓi, maḽori u ṋetshedza maḓi, dzibommbi na tshiimiswa tsha Mishumo ya Kunakisa Maḓi Mashika tsha Rooiwal (WWTW) swika zwino hu athu wanala vhuṱanzi vhu sumbaho uri ho wanala bakhitheria ya khoḽera kha zwiko izwi, zwine hezwi zwa ṋea fulufhelo ḽa uri hu na khonadzeo ya uri tshiwo itshi tsha khoḽera tshi nga vha tsho vha hone nga mulandu wa tshikafhadzwa ho bvelelaho fhethu huthihi fhedzi, lune zwiwo zwi re hone zwazwino zwa nga vha zwo vha hone nga mulandu wa tshikafhala ho vhangwaho nga zwiitisi zwa vhuvhili na zwa vhuraru (phiriselano).
tgt_text: Urhulumente useke ikomiti yeengcali, ekhokelwa liSebe lezeMpilo likaZwelonke, eza kujongana nale ngxaki yokuqhambuka kwesifo sotyatyazo e-Hammanskraal kwisiXeko sase-Tshwane, apho sele kusweleke abantu abali-15 ngokweengxelo zomhla wama-24 kuCanzibe..

src_text: Musi maga aya u lingedza tandulula thaidzo iyi tshi khou ḓi bvela phanḓa, vhadzulapo vha fhaḽa Hammanskraal vha khou ṱuṱuwedzwa uri vha vhilise maḓi avho bommbini nahone vha shele na muṋo muṱuku phanḓa ha musi vha tshi nwa.
tgt_text: Sithetha nje uyaqhuba umsebenzi omkhulu wokuzingela izinto ezinokuba zizo ezingcolise amanzi, ukusuka emanzini la uqobo, ukuya kwiiloli ezithutha amanzi, iimpompo zamanzi kunye ne-Rooiwal Wastewater Treatment Works (i-WWTW).

src_text: Zwiṅwe hafhu, muthu muṅwe na muṅwe ane vha na malani silingwa kana tsumbadwadze dza thaidzo ya tsukanyo tea uri nga ṱavhanya dalele dokotela wawe kana kiḽiniki ya henefho tsini nae..
tgt_text: Ukuza kuthi ga ngoku, akukabikho bungqina bukhomba ukuba intsholongwane yesifo sotyatyazo ifumaneka kwezi zinto zikhankanyiweyo, into leyo ke efuna ukuhambelana nalo mbono uthi kungenzeka ukuba olu qhambuka lubangelwe yile ntsholongwane ethe yangena ngebhaqo emanzini, baze ke aba bantu banaso ngoku babe bosulelwe ngabanye abantu okanye bosulelwe ngabo nabo bosulelweyo.

src_text: Minisṱa vha Muhasho wa Maḓi na Vhuthathazwitzhili, Vho Senzo Mchunu, vha ḓo vha na muṱangano na Ṋeḓorobo wa Ḓorobo khulwane ya Tshwane, Mukhantseḽara Vho Cilliers Brink, nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 26 Shundunthule 2023 itela lingedza bveledza pulane yo ṱanganelaho ya mushumo wa vusuluswa ha tshiimiswa tsha Rooiwal WWTW tshine tsho vha tsho tea tsho no vusuluswa kale itela wana zwidodombedzwa zwinzhi, vha nga founela kha nomboro ya luṱingo ya Tshiimiswa tsha Malwadze Phirela tsha Lushaka (NICD) shumaho awara dza 24 nga ḓuvha kha 082 883.
tgt_text: Njengoko la malinge okungenelela eqhuba, abahlali base-Hammanskrral bayacelwa ukuba bawabilise amanzi aphume empompeni baze bawathi chatha intwana yetyuwa phambi kokuba bawasele.

src_text: Tsumbamaitele dza ilafha vhulwadze ha Khoḽera dzi wanala kha inthanethe kha www.nicd.ac.za.
tgt_text: Ukongeza, nabani na osesisu esihambisayo, onesicaphu-caphu okanye olunywa sisisu kufuneka aye kwagqirha okanye kwiklinikhi ekufutshane ngokukhawuleza.

src_text: Ṱhoḓisiso dza zwa Vhashumi dza Kotara (QLFS).
tgt_text: UMphathiswa wezaManzi noGutyulo, uMnu Senzo Mchunu, uza kubamba intlanganiso noSodolophu wesiXeko sase-Tshwane, uCeba u-Cilliers Brink, ngoLwesihlanu, umhla wama-26 kuCanzibe 2023 apho baza kupheka isicwangciso bobabini esiza kwenza umsebenzi ofanele ukuba wenziwe kudala wokulungiswa kwe-Rooiwal WWTW.

src_text: Khabinethe khou ṱuṱuwedzwa nga fhungo ḽa uri QLFS ya thoma ya ṅwaha wa 2023 yo sumbedzisa uri ho vha na nyengedzedzo ya vhurathi ya nga kotara nga tevhekana kha tshivhalo tsha mishumo khathihi na uri zwa tholwa ha vhathu vha swikaho.
tgt_text: Xa ufuna iinkcukacha ezithe vetshe, tsalela umnxemba iZiko leSizwe leziFo ezoSulelayo (i-NICD) elisebenza imini nobusuku kule nombolo: 082 883.

src_text: 2 miḽioni zwi khou vhonala zwi tshi khou ri sendedzela tsini na uri ri swike kha tshivhalo tsha.
tgt_text: Iindlela zokunyanga isifo sotyatyazo ziyafumena ku-intanethi apha: www.nicd.ac.za.

src_text: 4 miḽioni tsha vhathu vho tholiwaho kha maḓuvha phanḓa ha tshiwo tsha dwadze ḽa Khoronavairasi (COVID-19).
tgt_text: UPhando lweKota lwezeMisebenzi (i-QLFS).

src_text: Hezwi zwi tou vha tsumbo re khagala ya uri ikonomi ya Afrika Tshipembe khou vhonala tshi khou vhuyelela nga nḓila yo khwaṱhaho vhukuma bva kha masiandaitwa dwadze iḽo..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ichulumancile kukuba i-QLFS yokuqala yowama-2023 ibonakalise ukuba inani lemisebenzi linyuke iikota ezintandathu zilandelana futhi nelabantu abaqeshiweyo abazizigidi ezili-.

src_text: Mbalombalo dza nga ha vhathu vhane vha khou shuma dza kotara ya thoma dzo sumbedza uri ho sikwa mishumo swikaho 209 000 kha sekhithara yo dzudzanyeaho ngeno miṅwe mishumo ya 107 000 yo sikwa kha sekhithara songo dzudzanyeaho kha tshifhinga tsha kotara ya thoma ya ṅwaha..
tgt_text: 2 linyuke lasondela kwela nani lezizigidi ezili-.

src_text: Vhushaka ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na ḽa Amerika (US) .

Khabinethe yo ombedzela zwauri vhushaka vhukati ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na ḽa Amerika vhu kha ḓi vha havhuḓi, ho khwaṱha nahone vhune ha vhuedza masia oṱhe swika zwino nga murahu ha muṱangano we wa vha hone vhukati ha Minisṱa vha Muhasho wa Vhushaka ha Dzitshaka na Tshumisano, Dokotela Vho Naledi Pandor na Muambasada wa ḽa Amerika fhano Afrika Tshipembe, Vho Reuben Brigety, nga murahu ha maambiwa avho he khao vha vha vha tshi khou pomoka
tgt_text: zabantu ababephangela phambi kokufika kukabhubhane weNtsholongwane ye-Corona (i-COVID-19).

src_text: Afrika Tshipembe uri ḽo ṋetshedza zwiṱhavhane kha shango ḽa Russia.
tgt_text: Oku kubonisa ngokuphandle ukuba uqoqosho loMzantsi Afrika luyahluma kwakhona emva kokuba luthwaxwe ngula bhubhane.

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya ombedzela zwauri hu na nḓila dzi ḓivheaho dza zwa vhudipuḽomati dzine dza tea shumiswa nga tshaka dzoṱhe, hu tshi katelwa na shango ḽa US, kha bvisela khagala thaidzo dzine vha vha nadzo zwenezwo musi dzi tshi tutuwa kha zwa kulangelwe kwa vhushaka ha vhavhili.
tgt_text: Iinkcukacha-mani zibonakalisa ukuba kudalwe imisebenzi engama-209 000 ngekota yokuqala kwicandelo lemisebenzi ebhaliswe ngokusesikweni yaze yangama-107 000 edalwe kwicandelo lemisebenzi engabhaliswanga ngokusesikweni kwikota yokuqala yalo nyaka.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza nḓivhadzo nga Phresidennde Vho Cyril Ramaphosa ya vhumbwa ha ṱhoḓisiso yo ḓiimisaho nga yoṱhe ya ṱoḓisisa mavharivhari u ṋetshedzwa ha zwiṱhavhane zwi bvaho fhano kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe zwi tshi ṋewa shango ḽa Russia.
tgt_text: Ubudlelwane phakathi koMzantsi Afrika ne-United States (i-US).

src_text: Zwidodombedzwa zwa ṱhoḓisiso iyo zwi ḓo ḓivhadzwa musi tshifhinga tshi tshi swika.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikubethelele ukuba ubudlelwane phakathi koMzantsi Afrika ne-US busebuhle, bungqingqwa futhi bululutho kuwo omabini la mazwe emva kwentlanganiso ibiphakathi koMphathiswa wezoBudlelwane baMazwe ngaMazwe neNtsebenziswano, uGq Naledi Pandor kunye noNozaku-zaku wase-US eMzantsi Afrika, uMnu Reuben Brigety, emalunga nezityholo azenzileyo zokuba uMzantsi Afrika uthengisela i-Russia izixhobo.

src_text: Vhushaka vhukati ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na ḽa Singapore.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikubethelela ukuba amaqonga afanelekileyo asetyenziswa ngoonozaku-zaku avuleleke kuwo onke amazwe, kuquka ne-US, ukuba avakalise izinto angaziqondiyo eziza kuchaphazela ubudlelwane phakathi kwamazwe.

src_text: Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vho ṱanganedza Minisṱa Muhulwane wa Riphabuḽiki ya Singapore Vho Lee Hsien Loong nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 16 Shundunthule..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi isamkele isibhengezo esenziwe nguMongameli u-Cyril Ramaphosa sokuseka ikhomishoni yophando ezimeleyo ize iphande ezi zityholo zokuthengiselwa kwezixhobo kwe-Russia nguMzantsi Afrika.

src_text: Shango ḽa Singapore ndi mubindudzi muhulwane fhano kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe, hune ha vha na vhubindudzi ha masheleni fhiraho R5 biḽioni kha sekhithara dzi fanaho na zwa vhumagi, tshumelo dza zwa masheleni na zwa ndaka.
tgt_text: Iinkcukacha zale khomishoni yophando ziza kubhengezwa kungentsuku zatywala.

src_text: Thendelano dzo sainwaho vhukati ha mashango aya mavhili ndi dzine dzo livhiswa kha khwaṱhisa mbambadzo, vhubindudzi, pfunzo na tshumisano kha zwa vhupileli.
tgt_text: Ubudlelwane boMzantsi Afrika ne-Singapore.
UMongameli Ramaphosa ebendwendwelwe yiNkulumbuso u-Lee Hsien Loong weRiphabhlikhi yase-Singapore ngoLwesibini, umhla we-16 kuCanzibe.

src_text: Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya nga ha Ḽiedza ḽa Mveledziso ya Tshiṱiriki tsha Kapa Vhukovhela (DDM).

Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vho fara Imbizo ya Phresidennde ya vhurathi ya nga ha DDM ya fhaḽa Kapa Vhukovhela, kha Masipala Wapo wa Drakenstein, kha Tshiṱiriki tsha Cape Winelands, nga Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 19 Shundunthule..
tgt_text: I-Singapore ityale imali eninzi apha eMzantsi Afrika, kangangokuba ingaphezulu kweebhiliyoni ezi-R5 iimali etyalwe leliya lizwe kumacandelo afana nelemizi-mveliso, iinkonzo zezimali kunye nezokuthengiselwana komhlaba nezindlu.

src_text: Phresidennde vho ranga phanḓa vhurumelwa vhu bvaho kha masia mararu muvhuso nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “A hu Tei vha na Tsaleli”.
tgt_text: Izivumelwano ezityikityiweyo ngala mazwe mabini zineenjongo zokuqinisa ubudlelwano bezorhwebo, utyalo-mali, imfundo kunye nokusebenzisana kwimiba yezokhuselo.

src_text: Imbizo iyi yo vha yo rangelwa phanḓa nga madalo Phresidennde kha vhupo vhu re henefho nga tsini ha Tshiṱuṱuwedzi tsha Mveledziso ya Vhudzulo ha Vhathu ha Vlakkeland, vhune ha vha vhupo vhuhulwanesa ha mveledziso ya vhudzulo ha tshitshavha swika zwino kha Masipala Wapo wa Drakenstein.
tgt_text: Imbizo kaMongameli yaseNtshona Koloni yeNkqubo yoPhuhliso lweziThili (i-DDM).

src_text: Mveledziso ye ya thomiwa nga ṅwaha wa 2017 dzi ḓo ri musi dzi tshi khunyeledzwa, dza ṋetshedza madzulo swikala 2 556 kha vhathu vho teaho vhane vha tea vhuelwa.
tgt_text: UMongameli Ramaphosa ebebambe Imbizo kaMongameli yesithandathu ye-DDM eNtshona Koloni, kuMasipala weNgingqi wase-Drakenstein, kwiSithili sase-Cape Winelands, ngoLwesihlanu, umhla we-19 kuCanzibe.

src_text: Zwa fhaṱwa ha nnḓu dzi swikaho 942 kha Luṱa lwa Thoma zwazwino zwi kati, lune ho no khunyeledzwa dziṅwe dzi swikaho 454 ngeno dziṅwe dza 301 hu hone dzi tshi kha ḓi vha kati na fhaṱiwa.
tgt_text: UMongameli ebekhokele igqiza lawo omathathu amaqoqo karhulumente phantsi komxholo othi: “Kungashiywa Namnye Ngasemva”.

src_text: Ndeme ya thandela iyi ndi ya uri ṋetshedza tshaka dzo fhambanaho dza dzinnḓu bva kha idzo dza avho vhane vha vha na muholo wa vhukati ha R0 swika R3 500 (nga fhasi ha Vula Nḓila Ntswa) ya kha Mbekanyamushumo ya Sabusidi ya Muthu Muthihi yo Ṱumanywaho na Masheleni, kha avho vhane vha hola muholo wa vhukati ha R3,501 na R22 000 nga ṅwaha.
tgt_text: Le Mbizo ibanjwe emva kokuba uMongameli ebetyelele i-Vlakkeland Catalytic Human Settlement Development ekutshane phaya, elelona phulo likhulu likarhulumente lokwakhiwa kwezindlu oko wasekwayo lo Masipala weNgingqi wase-Drakenstein.

src_text: Zwoṱhe zwikhala zwa Nnḓu dza zwa Matshilisano khathihi na zwikhala zwa Nnḓu dza Vhahali vha zwa Mmbi zwi wanala kha thandela iyi.
tgt_text: Lo msebenzi wokwakha waqaliswa ngowama-2017 xa ugqityiwe uza kwakha izindlu ezingama-2 556 eziza kufunyanwa ngabantu abafanelekileyo.

src_text: Madalo Vhulavhelesi kha Masipala Muhulwane wa eThekwini na kha Masipala wa Tshiṱiriki wa uMgungundlovu nga ḽa 18 na 19 Shundunthule.
tgt_text: Umsebenzi wokwakhiwa kwezindlu ezingama-942 kwiSigaba sokuQala wona sele uqhuba, ezingama-454 zona sele zakhiwe zona ezingama-301 zisakhiwa.

src_text: Muthusaphresidennde Vho Paul Mashatile vho amba na vhathu vha kwameaho bva kha zwa pfunzo na vhugudisi, vhulimivhufuwi, makwevho na nḓowetshumo nga tshifhinga tsha madalo avho zwa vhulavhelesi fhaḽa kha Masipala Muhulwane wa eThekwini na kha Masipala wa Tshiṱiriki wa uMgungundlovu sa tshipiḓa tsha madalo vhulavhelesi DDM.
tgt_text: Eli phulo libalulekile kuba lakha iintlobo zezindlu ezahlukeneyo ukusukela kwezo zabo bamkela umvuzo oyi-R0 ukuya kwabo bamkela i-R3 500 (phantsi komgaqo-nkqubo obizwa ngokuba yi-Breaking New Ground), ukuya kula nkqubo ibizwa ngokuba yi-Financed Linked Individual Subsidy Programme, yabo bamkela phakathi kwe-R3 501 ne-R22 000 ngonyaka.

src_text: Iṅwe ya thandela dza ndeme dze dza dalelwa, ho vha vhupo ha Thandela ya Tshanduko ya Ntshongweni, hune ha vha vhupo vhune khaho ha khou fhaṱiwa Ḓorobo yo Bveledzeaho kha zwa Thekhinoḽodzhi vhukati ha ḓorobo ya Durban na ya Pietermaritzburg.
tgt_text: Le projekthi iza kwakha izindlu ezisiBonelelo sezeNtlalo kunye nezo zilungele amaGqala eeMfazwe.

src_text: Thandela iyi ḓo vusulusa mishumo ya zwa ikonomi kha vhupo honoho, lune ya ḓo ḓisa vhubindudzi vhu linganaho R15 biḽioni kha tshifhinga tsha miṅwaha ya 10 ya kha ya 15 ḓaho.
tgt_text: UTyelelo lokuHlola oluya kuMasipala oMbaxa waseThekwini noweSithili saseMgungundlovu ngomhla we-18 no-19 kuCanzibe.

src_text: Themamveledziso dza maḓi.
tgt_text: USekela-Mongameli u-Paul Mashatile ebebambe indibano yokufakana imilomo kunye namahlakani akwicandelo lezemfundo noqeqesho, ezolimo, ezorhwebo kunye nezoshishino ngethuba ekutyelelo lokuya kuhlola kuMasipala oMbaxa waseThekwini kunye noMasipala wesiThili saseMgungundlovu njengenxalenye yotyelelo lwe-DDM lokuya kuhlola.

src_text: Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vho dalela Thandela ya Maḓi ya Lesotho Highlands nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 23 Shundunthule 2023 he vha shela mulenzhe kha vhuṱambo ha vula Luṱa lwa 2 lwa thandela iyi.
tgt_text: Ezinye zeeprojekthi ezingundoqo yile yase-Ntshongweni Catalytic Project, apho kuza kwakhiwa isiXeko Sale Mihla phakathi kweTheku noMgungundlovu.

src_text: Sa thandela yo sainiwaho miṅwaha minzhi yo fhelaho nahone ya dovha ya vha na tshilengo, hovhu vhuṱambo ho sumbedza ndeme ya engedzwa ha luvhilo lwa shumiwa ha thandela iyi ine ya vha mushumo wa ndeme wa vhukati ha mashango aya mavhili.
tgt_text: Le projekthi iza kuvuselela uqoqosho lwale ngingqi, ize izale namathuba otyalo-mali axabisa imali ezibhiliyoni zeerandi ezili-15 kule minyaka ili-10 ukuya kweli-15 izayo.

src_text: Heyi Thandela ya Maḓi ya Lesotho Highlands ndi ya ndeme kha ita uri hu vhe na nḓisedzo ya maḓi kha vunḓu ḽa Gauteng, Free State, Mpumalanga, Devhula Vhukovhela na Kapa Devhula.
tgt_text: Iziseko ezingundoqo zamanzi.

src_text: Hovhu vhubindudzi ha kha themamveledziso ya maḓi vhune ha ḓo khwinifhadza matshilo vhadzulapo vha Afrika Tshipembe vhu khou bvela phanḓa nga mukovho wa masheleni fhiraho R14 biḽioni kha mimasipala itela tandulula thaidzo dza salela murahu ha themamveledziso dza zwa maḓi, nga kha Gavhelo ḽa Themamveledziso ya Dzingu nga Vhunzhi (RBIG) khathihi na Gavhelo ḽa Themamveledziso ya Tshumelo dza zwa Maḓi (WSIG).
tgt_text: UMongameli Ramaphosa ebendwendwele i-Lesotho Highlinds Water Project ngoLwesibini, umhla wama-23 kuCanzibe 2023 ngethuba ethatha inxaxheba kumsitho wokuphethulwa kwesoyi wesiGaba 2 sale projekthi.

src_text: Masheleni RBIG ḓo shumiswa kha thandela dzi swikaho 130 ngeno ayo WSIG tshi ḓo kovhelwa kha thandela dzi fhiraho 400 mona na shango.
tgt_text: Le projekthi yatyikitywa kule minyaka iliqela igqithileyo futhi nethe yalityaziswa zizinto ezininzi, lo msitho ubuluphawu olubonisa ukuqaliswa komsebenzi okhawulezileyo wale projekthi yamazwe amabini.

src_text: Khabinethe khou dovha hafhu ya pfa yo takadzwa nga fhungo ḽa uri Muhasho wa zwa Maḓi na Vhuthathazwitzhili (DWS) khou vha na mvelaphanḓa khulwane kha nndwa ya lwa na zwiito zwa vhuaḓa hune masheleni swikaho R600 miḽioni vha no badelwa murahu nga khamphani dze dza vhuelwa nga wana thendara dzi songo ḓaho nga ngona.
tgt_text: I-Lesotho Highlands Water Project ibaluleke kakhulu kumalinge okuqinisekisa ukuba kukho amanzi oneleyo e-Gauteng, Freyistatha, Mpumalanga, Mntla Ntshona naseMntla Koloni..

src_text: Khabinethe yo dovha hafhu ya dzhiela nṱha maga ndangulo ya thivhela a vhewa nga muhasho itela fhelisa kushumisele kwa masheleni nga nḓila ine ya si vhe yavhuḓi, ine ya si vhe na mbuelo nahone nga nḓila ya tambisea.
tgt_text: Ukutyala imali kwiziseko ezingundoqo zamanzi ukwenzela ukuphucula iimpilo zabemi boMzantsi Afrika kuqhubelekile ngokuthi kwabelwe oomasipala imali ezibhiliyoni zeerandi ezili-14 eza kusetyenziswa kwiziseko ezingundoqo zamanzi ezisanqongopheleyo, kusetyenziswa isibonelelo esibizwa ngokuba yi-Regional Bulk Infrastructure Grant (i-RBIG) kunye nesibizwa ngokuba yi-Water Services Infrastructure Grant (i-WSIG).

src_text: Pfufho ya Magavhelo zwa Matshilisano.
tgt_text: Isibonelelo se-RBIG siza kusetyenziswa kwiiprojekthi ezili-130 yona ke i-WSIG iza kusetyenziswa kwiiprojekthi ezingaphezulu kwama-400 kulo lonke eli lizwe.

src_text: Shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽo ṱanganedza Pfufho ya Maitele Avhuḓi ya Dzangano ḽa Magavhelo zwa Matshilisano ḽa Dzitshaka (ISSA) kha zwa Magavhelo zwa Matshilisano Afrika kha ṅwaha wa 2023, ḽine ḽa dzhiela nṱha vhubindudzi ha muvhuso kha matshilo vhana vhashu, nga maanḓa avho vhane vha bva kha miṱa yo shayaho nahone songo tsireledzeaho.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ichulumancile kukuba iSebe lezaManzi noGutyulo lisenza umsebenzi obonakalayo kwidabi lokulwa urhwaphilizo kuba imali emalunga nezigidi zeerandi ezingama-600 sele ibuyiselwe kwisebe isuka kwiinkampani ebezixhamle ngokutyikitya izivumelwano nesebe ezingekho mthethweni.

src_text: Zwa dzhenela vhuṱambo uvhu ha pfufho idzi dza maimo nṱha nga shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe, zwo vha nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U engedzwa nga zwiṱuku ha magavhelo zwa matshilisano uri kone katela na vhana vha songo tsireledzeaho: Fhungo ḽa Magavhelo Thikhedzo ya Vhana, Afrika Tshipembe”.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ivile nangamanyathelo aqulunqwe lisebe okuthintela urhwaphilizo kunye nokulwa inkcitho engekho mthethweni neyilahleko.

src_text: Ho ṱanganedzwa khumbelo dza tama dzhenela vhuṱambo uvhu bva kha zwiimiswa zwine zwa vha miraḓo zwi swikaho 48 zwa mashango fhiraho 30 dzhango ḽa Afrika.
tgt_text: IMbasa yeziBonelelo zeNtlalo.

src_text: Thuso yashu ya zwa matshilisano ndi tshone tshidziki tsha mbekanyamushumo dza fhelisa vhushai dza muvhuso nahone ndi dza ndeme kha vhuisa tshirunzi tsha vhathu vhashu.
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika uphumele imbasa ephezulu ebizwa ngokuba yi-Good Practice Award in Social Security for Africa 2023 ye-International Social Security Association (i-ISSA) eqhwabela izandla imali etyalwe ngurhulumente kubomi babantwana bethu, ingakumbi abo baphuma kumakhaya asokolayo nangathathi ntweni.

src_text: Sisṱeme ya magavhelo matshilisano ya ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ndi iṅwe ya sisṱeme dzine dza vha khulwanesa ḽifhasini, lune ya vha na vhathu vhane vha khou tea vhuelwa vha fhiraho 18 miḽioni..
tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika ungenelele olu khuphiswano lwale mbasa phantsi kwesihloko esithi: “Ukwandiswa kancinci kwenani labantwana abasokolayo abaxhamla kwiinkonzo zentlalo: uPhando ngeMali-sibonelelo yaBantwana, eMzantsi Afrika”.

src_text: Vouthu dza Migaganyagwama.
tgt_text: Abebengenelele olu khuphiswano bebeli-138 bebonke bephuma kwimibutho engamalungu engama-48 yona evela kumazwe angaphezulu kwama-30 ase-Afrika.

src_text: Khabinethe yo takadzwa nga fhungo ḽa uri Vouthu dza Migaganyagwama dza mihasho ya muvhuso dzi khou tshimbila zwavhuḓi.
tgt_text: Izibonelelo zethu zezentlalo ziyinxalenye yenkqubo karhulumente yokulwa indlala kwaye zibaluleke kakhulu ekubuyiseleni abantu bakuthi izidima zabo.

src_text: Sheduḽu ya Vouthu dza Migaganyagwama ine ya khou tevhela na nḓivhadzo dza tikedza dza vhoramafhungo:..
tgt_text: Inkqubo yezibonelelo-mali yoMzantsi Afrika iyenye yezona zinkulu kwihlabathi jikelele, kuba inabantu abaxhamla kuyo abangaphezulu kwizigidi ezili-.

src_text: Ḽavhuṱanu, ḽa 26 Shundunthule 2023 nga awara ya 13:00, Minisṱa vha Muhasho wa Tshumisano dza Mavhusele na Mafhungo Sialala (CoGTA), Mufumakadzi Vho Thembi Nkadimeng, vha ḓo ṋea muvhigo kha vhoramafhungo nga ha Vouthu ya Mugaganyagwama wa CoGTA une wa ḓo bvisela khagala maga livhiswaho kha khwaṱhisa mashumele mimasipala.
tgt_text: IVoti zoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali.
IKhabhinethi ichulumancile zindaba zokuba iVoti zoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali zamasebe karhulumente ziqhuba kakuhle.

src_text: Nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 30 Shundunthule 2023, Minisṱa vha Muhasho wa Mveledziso ya Matshilisano, Mufumakadzi Vho Lindiwe Zulu khathihi na Minisṱa Vha Vhulamukanyi na Tshumelo dza Dzidzhele, Vho Ronald Lamola, vha ḓo ḓivhadza Vouthu dza Migaganyagwama khathihi na zwiṅwe zwidodombedzwa zwa mivhigo yavho ya vhoramafhungo zwi ḓo anḓadzwa nga murahu...
tgt_text: Isicwangciso seeVoti zoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali ezisezayo kunye neentlanganiso noonondaba:..

src_text: Vouthu ya Mugaganyagwama wa Ofisi ya Phresidennde ḓo ṋetshedzwa nga Ḽavhuraru, ḽa 31 Shundunthule 2023 ngeno muvhigo wa vhoramafhungo wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa ya nga ha Tshanduko ya Milayo khathihi na Maga zwa Mishumo ane tshimbidzwa nga Operation Vulindlela tshi ḓo farwa nga Ḽavhuvhili, ḽa 30 Shundunthule.
tgt_text: NgoLwesihlanu, umhla wama-26 kuCanzibe 2023 ngentsimbi ye-13:00, uMphathiswa woLawulo lweNtsebenziswano neMicimbi yeMveli (i-CoGTA), uNksz Thembi Nkadimeng, uza kubamba intlanganiso namajelo eendaba ngeVoti yoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali ye-CoGTA apho aza kucacisa ngamanyathelo aza kuthatyathwa okuphucula umsebenzi woomasipala..

src_text: Vhuṱambo ha vhu20 ha Ḓuvha ḽa Afrika na Maitele Tsenguluso ya Vhuthihi ha Afrika (APRM).
tgt_text: NgoLwesibini, umhla wama-30 kuCanzibe, uMphathiswa woPhuhliso loLuntu, uNksz Lindiwe Zulu kunye noMphathiswa wezoBulungisa neeNkonzo zoLuleko, uMnu Ronald Lamola, baza kuqhuba iiVoti zoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali zamasebe wabo.

src_text: Khabinethe khathihi na vhadzulapo vhoṱhe vha ḽa Afika Tshipembe khou vha luthihi na dzhango ḽoṱhe ḽa Afrika khathihi na ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe nga angaredza kha pembelela Ḓuvha ḽa Afrika nga Ḽavhuṋa, ḽa 25 Shundunthule.
tgt_text: Iinkcukacha zeentlanganiso zabo namajelo eendaba ziza kukhutshwa kwalapha exesheni..

src_text: Uno ṅwaha ndi wa ndeme vhukuma sa izwi ṅwaha wa pembelela miṅwaha ya 60 bva tshe ha sainwa thendelanomviswa ya tumbulwa ha Dzangano ḽa Vhuthihi ha Afrika, ḽine ḽa vha ḽone ḽo rangelaho Mbumbano ya Afrika.
tgt_text: IVoti yoHlahlo Lwabiwo-mali ye-Ofisi kaMongameli iza kwenziwa ngoLwesithathu, umhla wama-31 kuCanzibe 2023 ize intlanganiso noonondaba engoTshintsho kwiNdlela Elimi Ngayo uQoqosho kunye namaPhulo oDalo-msebenzi aququzelelwa yi-Operation Vulindlela, ibanjwe ngoLwesibini, umhla wama-30 kuCanzibe.

src_text: Thero ya vhuṱambo ha ṅwaha wa 2023 ndi ine ya ri “U Ṱavhanyedza Thoma Shumiswa ha Vhupo ha Mbambadzo dzo Vhofholowaho ha Dzhango ḽa Afrika” – dzhiela nṱha ndingedzo dzine dza khou itwa kha zwa thoma shuma ha vhupo ha mbambadzo yo vhofholowaho vhu hulwanesa ḽifhasini..
tgt_text: USuku lwe-Afrika kunye nesikhumbuzo seminyaka engama-20 yeNkqubo yokuHlolana kwaMazwe ase-Afrika (i-APRM).

src_text: Vhuṱambo ha pembelela Ṅwedzi wa Afrika ha ṋaṅwaha, vhu khou vha hone nga tshifhinga tsha musi hu tshi khou pembelelwa miṅwaha ya 20 ya APRM, ine yo livhiswa kha ṱuṱuwedza mavhusele avhuḓi kha dzhango ḽoṱhe nga kha maitele u gudisana na sengulusana nga tshashu
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi nabemi bonke boMzantsi Afrika baza kubhiyozela uSuku lwe-Afrika njengelizwekazi le-Afrika kunye nehlabathi, ngoLwesine, umhla wama-25 kuCanzibe.

src_text: Tsheo dza Khabinethe .
tgt_text: Lo nyaka ubaluleke nangakumbi kuba ngunyaka wama-60 wesikhumbuzo sokutyikitywa koxwebhu olwaseka uMbutho woManyano lwe-Afrika (i-OAU), yona eyazala uMbutho weMbumba ye- Afrika (i-AU).

src_text: Vhupo ha zwa Ikonomi ho Khetheaho (SEZ) ha Namakwa.
tgt_text: Umxholo wemibhiyozo yowama-2023 othi – “Ukukhawulezisa ukuqaliswa koMmandla weLizwekazi le-Afrika ongaHlawulisani iRhafu yoRhwebelwano” – wakhela kulo msebenzi mkhulu sele wenziwe wokuseka nokuqinisekisa ukuba uyenza lo mmandla unguwona mkhulu ungahlawulisani irhafu yorhwebelwano.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza zwa tiwa ha vhupo ha Namakwa SEZ vhu re ngei Aggeneys kha ḽa Kapa Devhula tiiwa uhu hune ha khou dzinginywa hu khou itwa ya nga Mulayo wa Vhupo ho Khetheaho ha zwa Ikonomi, wa ṅwaha wa 2014 (Mulayo 16 wa 2014) nahone iyo SEZ ine ya khou dzinginywa ndi tshipiḓa tsha Fulo ḽa zwa Vhubindudzi ḽa Phresidennde.
tgt_text: Imibhiyozo yeNyanga ye-Afrika yalo nyaka ibanjwe kanye ngeminyake engama-20 yesikhumbuzo se-APRM, eneenjongo zokuphucula iindlela zolawulo kweli lizwekazi ngokuthi amazwe alo afundisane aze ahlolane odwa

src_text: Hovhu vhupo ha Namakwa SEZ vhu ḓo vula zwikhala zwa mbuelo kha zwa migodi, vhubveledzi ha geseluḓi dala, vhubveledzi ha themamveledziso, fulufulu ḽi vusuluseaho na zwa shandukiswa ha zwibveledzwa zwa vhulimi zwa vha zwiḽiwa.
tgt_text: IziGqibo zeKhabhinethi.

src_text: Hedzi sekhithara ndi dza ndeme kha sikwa ha mishumo khathihi na mveledziso ya ikonomi ya vhupo ha Kapa Devhula khathihi na shango nga angaredza..
tgt_text: UMmandla oKhethekileyo wezoQoqosho (i-SEZ) wase-Namakwa.

src_text: Vhubindudzi ha masheleni fhiraho R29 biḽioni ho no ḓi fulufhedziswa swika zwino kha luṱa lwa thoma lwa SEZ.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ikuvumile ukuthiywa ngokusesikweni kwe-Namakwa SEZ e-Aggeneys eMntla Koloni.

src_text: Hezwi zwi katela pfulufhedziso bva kha vha Vedanta Zinc (R16 biḽioni), Frontier Rare Earth (R13 biḽioni), Hive Energy (R200 miḽioni) na RRS Trade and Investment (R100 miḽioni)..
tgt_text: Le ndawo iza kubizwa ngokuba yi-SEZ ngokoMthetho weMimandla eKhethekileyo yezoQoqosho, wowama-2014 (uMthetho uNombl 16 wowama-2014) futhi le SEZ icetywayo iyinxalenye yePhulo likaMongameli loTyalo-mali.

src_text: Luṱa lwa Vhuraru lwa Maano Zwiko zwa Maḓi zwa Lushaka (NWRS-3).
tgt_text: I-Namakwa SEZ iza kuvula amathuba kwicandelo lokuxhamlisa kwezemigodi, elokuveliswa kwehaydrojini engeyongozi kokusingqongileyo, uphuhliso lweziseko zophuhliso, amandla ahlaziyekayo kunye nokucolwa kuhlelwa iimveliso zolimo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza NWRS-3 2023 uri ithome shumiswa nahone maano aya ndi ane vha mbofho kha maanḓalanga na zwiimiswa zwoṱhe zwine zwa khou shumisa Mulayo wa Maḓi wa Lushaka, wa 1998 (Mulayo 36 wa 1998).
tgt_text: La macandelo abaluleke kakhulu kumalinge okudala imisebenzi kunye nophuhliso loqoqosho lwaseMntla Koloni nolwelizwe.

src_text: Haya maano dzudzanywa hu tshi tevhedzwa tsenguluso ya miṅwaha miraru ya NWRS-2, ine ya vha yone ye ya ṱalusa masia ane ha vha na mvelaphanḓa khathihi na ayo ane kha ḓi vha na khaedu..
tgt_text: Imali yotyalo-mali engaphezulu kweebhiliyoni zeerandi ezingama-29 sele ibekelwe bucala ukuncedisa kwisigaba sokuqala sale SEZ.

src_text: NWRS-3 yo vhumbwa nga zwipikwa zwiraru zwine zwa elana, zwine masia maḓi na vhuthathazwitzhili tea tikedza mveledziso yazwo fheliswa ha vhushai na tshayandingano shela mulenzhe kha ikonomi na sika mishumo, na uri maḓi tea tsireledzwa shumiswa bveledziswa ṱhogomelwa na langwa nga nḓila ine nga vha hone lwa tshifhinga tshilapfu nahone nga nḓila linganaho.
tgt_text: Le mali iquka izithembiso ezazenziwe ngu-Vedanta Zinc (ezibhiliyoni zeerandi ezili-16), ngu-Frontier Rare Earth (ezibhiliyoni zeerandi ezili-13), Hive Energy (ezizigidi zeerandi ezingama-200) kunye no-RRS Trade and Investment (ezizigidi zeerandi ezili-100).
UPapasho lwesiThathu lwesiCwangciso-qhinga seSizwe seMithombo yaManzi (i-NWRS-3) lowama-.

src_text: Haya maano dzinginya makumedzwa pfalaho u engedza nḓisedzo ya maḓi fhungudza ṱhoḓea ya maḓi, ndangulo yavhuḓi ya maḓi na vhuthathazwitzhili langa sekhithara ya maḓi na vhuthathazwitzhili ṋetshedza hafhu maḓi hu tshi itelwa tshanduko ṱuṱuwedza tshumisano ya dzitshaka langa maḓi na vhuthathazwitzhili nga fhasi ha kilima ine ya khou shanduka..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyivumile i-NWRS-3 yowama-2023 ukuba iqalise ukusetyenziswa kwaye esi sicwangciso-qhinga sibophelela onke amaziko namagosa anamagunya ukuba aqalise ukusebenzisa uMthetho waManzi eSizwe, wowe-1998 (uMthetho 36 wowe-1998).

src_text: Heyi NWRS-3 anḓadzwa kha webusaithi ya DWS ine ya vha www.dws.gov.za..
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso-qhinga sisekelwe kuphononongo lweminyaka emithathu le-NWRS-2, oluthe lwabona iindawo eziqhube kakuhle kunye nezo kusekho ukuqhwalela kuzo.

src_text: Muvhigo wa nga ha maga thomaho shumiswa nga Muhasho wa zwa Vhupileli (DoD) hu tshi itelwa tandulula thaidzo dza mikhwa na vhuḓifari ha miraḓo ya Mmbi ya Vhupileli ha Lushaka ya Afrika Tshipembe (SANDF) vhane vha vha vho rumelwa kha mishumo ya ḓisa mulalo..
tgt_text: I-NWRS-3 inemixholo engundoqo emithathu, owokuba kufuneka amanzi nogutyulo axhase uphuhliso, ukulwa indlala nokungalingani, ukufaka isandla kuqoqosho nokudala imisebenzi, nokuba amanzi kufuneka akhuselwe, asetyenziswe, aphuhliswe, aphathwe aze alawulwe ngendlela engazikuwatshabalalisa nelinganayo.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza muvhigo wa nga ha mvelaphanḓa ine shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽa khou ita hu tshi itelwa tandulula thaidzo dza vhuḓifari ha miṅwe miraḓo ya SANDF ine ya vha yo rumelwa kha mishumo ya ḓisa mulalo mona na dzhango ḽa Afrika.
tgt_text: Esi sicwangciso-qhinga senza izindululo ezibambekayo zokuba kwandiswe umthamo wamanzi akhoyo, kuphungulwe isantya asetyenziswa ngaso, ukulawula ngokufanelekileyo kwamanzi nogutyulo, ukuqulunqa imithetho eza kulawula icandelo lezamanzi nogutyulo, ukutshintshwa kwendlela ankinkishwa ngayo kusenzelwa ukwenza iinguqu, ukukhuthaza intsebenziswano namazwe ehlabathi kunye nokukwazi ukulawula amanzi nogutyulo phantsi kwezi meko zokuguqu-guquka kwemozulu.

src_text: SANDF yo ḓi dzulela vhonala sa tshiko tsha ḓihudza ha lushaka sa izwi tshi shela mulenzhe kha vhurumelwa ha ḓisa mulalo kha dzhango ḽa Afrika itela uri hu vhe na mulalo na vhudziki kha dzitshaka dzine dza vha dzo hoṱefhadzwa nga dzinndwa fhano kha dzhango ḽa Afrika tshi khou shuma nga fhasi ha Dzangano ḽa Vhuthihi ha Dzitshakha (UN)..
tgt_text: I-NWRS-3 ipapashwe kule webhusayithi ye-DWS: www.dws.gov.za..

src_text: Musi hu tshi vha na mavharivhari milandu ya zwa vhudzekani nga ṅwaha wa 2015, ho mbo ḓi vhumbwa Tshigwada tsha shuma tsha Vhukati ha Dziminisṱa nga ṅwaha wa 2019 itela uri hu kone ṱoḓisiswa milandu iyi ya sa fara zwavhuḓi na tambudza lwa vhudzekani (SEA) ine ya bvelela ngomu kha DoD..
tgt_text: Ingxelo ngamanyathelo athatyathwe liSebe lezoKhuselo (i-DoD) ukulungisa ingxaki yokuziphatha kwamajoni oMkhosi wezoKhuselo weSizwe waseMzantsi Afrika (i-SANDF) atyalwe kumaphulo ogcino-xolo..

src_text: Khabinethe yo fushea nga mutevhe wa maga a vhewa itela tandulula thaidzo dza zwiito zwa SEA ngomu kha vhurumelwa ha ḓisa mulalo ha SANDF.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ifumene ingxelo malunga nomgama osele uhanjwe nguMzantsi Afrika ukulungisa ezi zingxaki zinxulumene nendlela aziphethe ngawo amanye amalungu e-SANDF atyalwe kumaphulo ogcino-xolo kweli lizwekazi lethu.

src_text: Dzangano ḽa Vhuthihi ha Dzitshaka ḽi dzhia shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe sa ḽine ḽa vha na maitele khwinesa nahone ḽo fhululedza shango ḽashu kha mvelaphanḓa ye ḽa ita kha nndwa ya fhelisa tshoṱhe zwiito zwa SEA ngomu kha SANDF.
tgt_text: I-SANDF ibisinika iwonga nodumo sisisizwe ngokuthatha kwayo inxaxheba kumaphulo ogcino-xolo kweli lizwekazi ukuqinisekisa ukuba kukho uzinzo noxolo kumazwe ase-Afrika athwaxwa zimfazwe ikwenza oku iyinxalenye yeZizwe eziManyeneyo (i-UN).

src_text: Khabinethe yo ombedzela uri zwiito zwa SEA zwi nga ḓo konḓelelwa uri zwi bvele phanḓa na tshinyadza rekhodo yavhuḓi ine SANDF ya vha nayo kha dzhango ḽa Afrika..
tgt_text: Ukuvela ngowama-2015 kwezityholo zokuxhaphaza ngokwesondo ezibhekiswa kumajoni ayinxalenye yogcino-xolo kwakhokelela ekubeni kusekwe iKomiti yabaPhathiswa ngowama-2019 ukuze iphande izityholo zokuxhaphaza ngokwesondo nempathombi (i-SEA) kwi-DoD.

tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ichulumance kakhulu ngala manyathelo aza kuthatyathwa ukulwa ezi ngxaki zinxulumene ne-SEA kumaphulo ogcino-xolo e-SANDF.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza Mbekanyamushumo ya Ṅwedzi wa Vhaswa ya 2023 nga fhasi ha thero ine ya ri: “U engedza mbofholowo ya vhaswa kha zwa ikonomi hu tshi itelwa vhumatshelo ha tshifhinga tshilapfu”.
tgt_text: I-UN iyawuhlonipha uMzantsi Afrika njengelizwe eliziphatha ngendlela engenasiphako kwaye iliqhwabele izandla eli lizwe ngomsebenzi esele liwenzile wokusiphula neengcambu i-SEA kwi-SANDF.
IKhabhinethi ikubethelele ukuba imikhutyana ye-SEA ayizikuvunyelwa ukuba ingcolise igama elihle le-SANDF kweli lizwekazi.

src_text: Muthusaphresidennde Vho Mashatile vha ḓo ṋetshedza tshipitshi nga Ḓuvha ḽa Lushaka ḽine kha uno ṅwaha ḽa ḓo pembelelwa lwa tshifhinga tsha maḓuvha mavhili bva nga ḽa 16 swika 17 Fulwi 2023 fhaḽa Sentharani ya zwa Mitambo ya nga Nnḓa ya Mangaung, Bloemfontein, kha ḽa Free State.
tgt_text: INyanga yoLutsha yowama-.

src_text: Kha tshenetshi tshifhinga tsha maḓuvha mararu, hu ḓo vha na tshikhala tshine ngatsho vhaswa vha ḓo kona shela mulenzhe kha nyambedzano na Dziminisṱa, Vhathusaminisṱa khathihi na vhaṅwe vhashelamulenzhe vha kwameaho nga ha vhugudisi ho fhambanaho, zwikhala zwa mabindu na zwa mveledziso zwine zwa vha hone kha muvhuso na vhashumisani kha zwa matshilele..
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi iyamkele iNkqubo yowama-2023 yeNyanga yoLutsha phantsi komxholo othi: “Ukukhawulezisa amaphulo okuxhobisa ulutsha ngezoqoqosho ukwenzela ikamva eliqaqambileyo”.

src_text: Ṅwedzi wa Vhaswa ḓo rwelwa ṱari nga Ḽavhuṋa, ḽa 1 Fulwi nga Minisṱa Ofisini ya Phresidennde vho hweswaho maanḓa Muhasho wa Vhafumakadzi, Vhaswa na Vhathu vha re na Vhuholefhali, Dokotela Vho Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma fhaḽa kha vhupo ha tshiga tsha Tshihumbudzi tsha Hector Pieterso na Muziamu tshi re fhaḽa kha ḽa Soweto..
tgt_text: USekela-Mongameli uMashatile uza kwenza intetho ngoSuku lweSizwe kulo nyaka oluza kuqhuba iintsuku ezimbini ukususela ngomhla we-16 ukuya kowe-17 kweyeSilimela 2023 e-Mangaung Outdoor Sport Centre, e-Mangaung, e-Bloemfontein, eFreyistatha.

src_text: Khabinethe yo eletshedza tshitshavha uri tshi engedze mafulufulu itela vhona uri vhathu vhaswa vha khou kona swikela zwikhala zwine zwa vha tendela uri vha kone ḓidzhenisa kha zwa shela mulenzhe kha ikonomi nga nḓila yo fhelelaho.
tgt_text: Eza ntsuku zimbini ziza kunika ulutsha ithuba lokuthatha inxaxheba kwiingxoxo kunye nabaPhathiswa, amaSekela abaPhathiswa kunye namanye amahlakani ezimalunga namathuba amaninzi akhoyo ezoqoqosho, ushishino nophuhliso kurhulumente nakumahlakani ezentlalo.

src_text: Muvhuso, sa wone mutholi muhulwanesa, wo fhindula kha ṱhoḓea dza mveledziso ya zwikili na maanḓafhadzwa ha vhaswa nga ita uri vhaswa vho fhedzaho pfunzo dzavho dza dziyunivesithi vhane vha si vhe na mishumo vha kone wana tshenzhemo ya mishumo nga kha Mbekanyamushumo ya zwa Vhugudi na Vhugudisi ha Mishumo ya avho vho fhedzaho pfunzo dza Yunivesithi ya Muhasho wa Tshumelo dza Muvhuso.
tgt_text: INyanga yoLutsha iza kuphehlelelwa ngokusesikweni ngoLwesine, umhla woku-1 kweyeSilimela nguMphathiswa okwi-Ofisi kaMongameli wezamaNina, uLutsha kunye naBantu abaKhubazekileyo, uGq Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma e-Hector Pieterson Memorial and Museum e-Soweto.

src_text: Muvhuso khou dovha hafhu wa thoma shumisa Tshikwama tsha Mishumo ya zwa Matshilisano, Social Employment Fund (SEF) khathihi na maga u sika mishumo Tshumelo dza Vhaswa dza Lushaka (NYS) vusuluswaho nahone ane kona kungedzela vhaswa vha zwigidi na zwigidi ngomu kha ikonomi.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi icele isizwe ukuba siwaqinise amalinge okuqinisekisa ukuba abantu abatsha bayawafumana amathuba aza kubanceda ukuba bakwazi ukudlala indima ebonakalayo kuqoqosho.

Urhulumente, njengolona qumrhu liqeshe abona bantu baninzi, uthathe amanyathelo afanelekileyo okusabela kumba wokufuneka kophuhliso lwezakhono kunye nokuqeshwa kolutsha ngokuvumela abo banezidanga bangasebenziyo ukuba bafumane amava omsebenzi ngokusebenzisa i-Public Service Graduate Internship and Leadership Programme.

src_text: Maga Mishumo ya Vhaswa Phresidennde na one no ḓi kona tikedza vhaswa kha kona swikela zwikhala zwi swikaho.
tgt_text: Urhulumente uqalise amaphulo okudala imisebenzi aquka i-Social Employment Fund waze wavuselela ne-National Youth Service (i-NYS) enika amawaka abantu abatsha amathuba okuba bakwazi ukuthatha inxaxheba kuqoqosho.

src_text: 5 miḽioni zwine ngazwo vhaswa vha vha vha tshi khou kona wana miholo ya tshifhinganyana vhewa ha vhaswa kha mishumo swikaho miḽioni nthihi, zwikhala zwa guda zwi katelaho na mishumo zwa 250 000 khathihi na zwiṅwe zwikhala zwa 250 000 zwa tshumelo dzi badelaho hu tshi katelwa na vhaswa vha swikaho 500 000 vhane vho dzheniswa kha zwikhala zwa muholo wa tshifhinga tshilapfu.

src_text: Musi ri tshi khou dzhena kha Ṅwedzi wa Vhaswa, muvhuso khou eletshedza vhathu vhaswa uri vha ḓiṅwalise kha puḽatifomo ya SAYouth.mobi , ine ya vha puḽatifomo ine khayo vha nga kona swikela zwikhala zwa mishumo sa izwi vhaṅwe ngavho vha swikaho miḽioni nṋa vho no ḓiṅwalisa swika zwino farwa ha Muṱangano wa zwa Ṱhoḓisiso dza zwa Vhulimi fhano Afrika (FARA), Khonifarentsi ya vhumalo (8) ya Mabindu zwa Vhulimi Afrika na Vhege ya Saintsi khathihi na Guvhangano ḽa Nnyi na Nnyi ḽa vhu..

src_text: Nga fara vhuṱambo uvhu, Afrika Tshipembe ḽi ḓo vhuelwa vhukuma bva kha tshumisano na vhufarisani na zwiimiswa zwa vhulimi na ṱhoḓisiso zwa fhano kha dzhango ḽa Afrika musi hu tshi vha na kovhana ha nḓivho na maitele avhuḓi kha zwa saintsi ya vhulimi na ṱhoḓisiso.
tgt_text: I-FARA ngumbutho weli lizwekazi ongumpondo-zihlanjiwe ojongene nomsebenzi wokuququzelela nokukhokela uphando-nzulu kwezolimo nokuphucula ubuchule bokuyila kweli lizwekazi.

src_text: Shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽi dzhiela nṱha ṱhoḓisiso dza zwa vhulimi itela mveledziso, nga maanḓa zwino musi hu na thaidzo ya tshanduko ya kilima na zwiṅwe zwithu zwine zwa kwama vhukoni ha shango ha kona swikela nḓisedzo ya zwiḽiwa, mveledziso ya ikonomi na mishumo.
tgt_text: Ngokubamba lo msitho, uMzantsi Afrika uza kufumana amathuba okuqhuba intsebenziswano nobambiswano kunye namaziko ezolimo nophando kweli lizwekazi ngokwabelana ngezona ndlela zingcono zokusebenza kwezenzulwazi yezolimo ukwenzela uphuhliso, ingakumbi kule meko sijongene nayo yokuguqu-guquka kwemozulu kunye nemiba eyimiqobo ethintela eli elizwe lingabi nakutya kwaneleyo, uphuhliso loqoqosho kunye nemisebenzi.

src_text: Khabinethe yo ṱanganedza mvetamveto ya Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya IPID wa ṅwaha wa 2023 uri rumelwe Phalamenndeni..
tgt_text: Uyilo loMthetho-siHlomelo oYilwayo weCandelo eliziMeleyo likaKhala wamaPolisa (i-IPID) wowama-.

src_text: Mulayotibe uyu khwinisa Mulayo wa IPID, wa ṅwaha wa 2011 (Mulayo 1 wa 2011), nahone wa dovha wa ṋetshedza makumedzwa livhiswaho kha khwaṱhisa zwa ḓiimisa nga ndoṱhe ha tshiimiswa na kha mashumele IPID, zwine hezwi zwa khwaṱhisedza izwo zwine zwa ḓivhiwa sa “McBride judgement”.

Khwiniso idzi dzi dovha hafhu dza lavhelesa kha fhungo ḽe ḽa ambiwa nga Khothe ya Ndayotewa ye ya ḓivhadza uri dziṅwe mbetshelwa dza Mulayo wa IPID wa ṅwaha wa 2011 dziho mulayoni, zwine hezwi zwa ṋea maanḓa Minisṱa vha Muhasho wa Mapholisa uri vha imise shuma Mulangi Muhulu, vha dzhie maga khaidzo kha Mulangi Muhulu nga murahu ha imiswa hawe shuma, khathihi na pandela Mulangi Muhulu mushumoni.
tgt_text: IKhabhinethi ilamkele uyilo loMthetho-siHlomelo oYilwayo we-IPID wowama-2023 ukuba lungeniswe ePalamente..

src_text: Mulayotibe dzinginya uri hu vhe na maitele re khagala nahone pfalaho u tholwa ha Mulangi Muhulu khathihi na maitele fhelelaho nahone itwaho nga vhuronwane hu tshi itelwa kona linga fulufhedzea ha vhaofisiri vha IPID.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo wenza izilungiso kuMthetho we-IPID wowama-2011 (uMthetho uNombl 1 wowama-2011), kwaye wenza neziphakamiso ezineenjongo zokuqinisekisa ukuba i-IPID izimele ngenene njengequmrhu kwakunye nendlela esebenza ngayo, into leyo izalisekisa imigqaliselo eyayimiselwe kwisigwebo setyala lika-McBride.

src_text: Mulayotibe uyu dovha hafhu wa ṋetshedza mbetshelwa ya khwinifhadzwa ha dziṅwe mbetshelwa dza Mulayo Muhulwane, hu itela uri IPID kone ita mushumo wayo nga nḓila yo fhelelaho nahone yavhuḓi.
tgt_text: Ezi zizilungiso ziza kusabela kanye kwimiba ephakanyiswe yiNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko eyathi amanye amasolotya oMthetho we-IPID wowama-2011 awekho mthethweni, agunyazisa uMphathiswa wezamaPolisa ukuba anqumamise uMlawuli wesiGqeba, ukuba athathele amanyathelo oluleko uMlawuli wesiGqeba emva kokuba enqunyanyisiwe, nokuba amgxothe uMlawuli wesiGqeba kwisikhundla sakhe..

src_text: Iyi mvetamveto ya Mulayotibe nga wanala kha webusaithi ya www.policesecretariat.gov.za.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo uphakamisa ukuba iinkqubo yokuqeshwa koMlawuli wesiGqeba kufuneka iqhutywe elubala futhi ivuleleke nokuba kubekho neenkqubo ecacileyo yokuvavanya ukunyaniseka kwamagosa e-IPID.

src_text: Mvetamveto ya Mulayotibe wa Khwiniso ya Milayo ya zwa Vhusevhi nga Angaredza (GILAB) ya ṅwaha wa.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo ukwavulela nokuba kwenziwe ezinye izilungiso kuMthetho oyiNtloko, ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuba i-IPID yenza umsebenzi wayo ewugunyazisiweyo kakuhle nangobuchule.

src_text: Mulayotibe ṋetshedza tshikhala tsha thomiwa ha khethekanyo ya vhuṅwaleli ho ḓiimisaho ha PSC hu tshi itelwa khwaṱhisa zwa ḓiimisa nga ndoṱhe na sa dzhia sia ha dzangano.
tgt_text: Lo Mthetho uYilwayo ucacise indlela eliza kusekwa ngayo iqumrhu lolawulo le-PSC eliza kuyenza izimele ngakumbi futhi ingathathi cala.

src_text: Musi Mulayotibe wo no phasiswa uri vhe mulayo, mushumo wa PSC vho ḓo engedzwa ya na kha mimasipala khathihi na zwiimiswa zwa muvhuso.
tgt_text: Wakuba lo Mthetho uYilwayo utyikitywe wangumthetho ogcweleyo, amagunya e-PSC aza kwandiswa ayenze ifikele nakoomasipala kunye namaqumrhu ombuso.

Esi silungiso siza kwenza i-PSC ibe nomsebenzi ocacileyo ize ikwazi ukuba negalelo elibonakalayo kumalinge okwakha urhulumente osabelayo, othembakelayo nokhokelisa imigaqo yokuziphatha esulungekileyo.

tgt_text: NgoMvulo, umhla wama-29 kuCanzibe 2023, uMongameli Ramaphosa uza kuzimasa umsitho amenywe kuwo wokuBekwa ngokuSesikweni kwalowo uza kuba nguMongameli we-Federal Republic of Nigeria, uMnu Bola Ahmed Tinubu..

src_text: Nga Musumbuluwo, wa ḽa 29 Shundunthule 2023, Phresidennde Vho Ramaphosa vha ḓo ṱanganedza thambo ya dzhenela vhuṱambo ha Dzheniswa Tshiduloni ha Phresidennde Vho Bola Ahmed Tinubu vha Riphabuḽiki ya Federala ya Nigeria vhane vha kha ḓi tou bva nangiwa shela mulenzhe ha Phresidennde hu ḓo sumbedza bvela phanḓa ha vhushaka ha ndeme vhu re hone vhukati ha shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe na ḽa Nigeria.
tgt_text: Ukuthatha inxaxheba kukaMongameli kulo msitho kubonakalisa ukuba isekhona intsebenziswano emandla phakathi koMzantsi Afrika ne-Nigeria.

src_text: Sango ḽa Nigeria ndi muvhambadzelani muhulwane vhukuma na shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe kha tshipiḓa tsha mashango re Vhukovhela ha dzhango ḽa Afrika.
tgt_text: I-Nigeria ilelona lizwe liliqabane lezorhwebo likhulu loMzantsi Afrika eNtshona Afrika.

src_text: Mamaga manzhi fhambanaho ḽa Afrika Tshipembe khou bindudza fhaḽa kha ḽa Nigeria, ngeno khamphani dza ḽa Nigeria na dzone dzi tshi khou thoma vhonala fhano kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe.
tgt_text: Iinkampani ezahlukeneyo zoMzantsi Afrika zityale imali e-Nigeria, ngeli thuba likhulayo nenani leenkampani zase-Nigeria ezingena eMzantsi Afrika..

tgt_text: UMzantsi Afrika uza kusingatha imidlalo emikhulu.

src_text: Shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽi khou fara mitambo mihulwane ya vhugweṋa.
tgt_text: Abalandeli bezemidlalo abaphuma kulo lonke elimiweyo kufanele balindele ukwamkelwa ngobubele obubonisa Ubuntu kunye nokutendwa ngothando xa beze kuzimasa eMzantsi Afrika iNdebe yeHlabathi yeBhola yoMnyazi kunye ne-Kimura Shukokai International (i-KSI) Karate World Championship.
UMzantsi Afrika wazenzela igama ngokugqwesa kwindlela oyisingatha ngayo imisitho emikhulu.

src_text: Vhafuni vha mitambo mona na ḽifhasi ḽoṱhe vha nga lavhelela ṱanganedzwa nga muya wa Ubuntu khathihi na farwa nga nḓila ya maimo nṱha musi vha tshi dzhenela mitambo ya Tshiphuga tsha Ḽifhasi tsha Netibolo khathihi na Vhugwena ha Ḽifhasi ha Karati ya Kimura Shukokai International (KSI) fhano kha ḽa Afrika Tshipembe.
Shango ḽa Afrika Tshipembe ḽi na rekhodo yavhuḓi ya kona fara vhuṱambo vhuhulwane ha ḽifhasi nga nḓila yavhuḓi.
